thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 46 of 2268
thread.title: Mr Bainbridge

author: Mr Bainbridge
title: Mr Bainbridge
text:
Great service in delivering bespoke blinds. Material choice and quality is always great - this is the 7th set of blinds we have ordered.
However 1 star off for the quality of the fixings which has changed in the last couple of sets we ordered. The screw heads easily chewed and made them unusable which is an unnecessary penny pinch and meant buying replacement screws.
